Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try              {                  using (var ctx = GetContext())                  {                      Console.WriteLine("Using Entity Framework version: " + ctx.GetType().BaseType.Assembly.FullName);                        var query1 = ctx.FooBars.Where(x => x.Id == 666);                      Console.WriteLine("Linq query  : ctx.FooBars.Where(x => x.Id == 666)");                      Console.WriteLine("-> SQL query:");                      Console.WriteLine(query1);                      Console.WriteLine();                      var query2 = ctx.FooBars.Where(x => new[] { 1' 2' 3 }.Contains(x.Id));                      Console.WriteLine("Linq query  : ctx.FooBars.Where(x => new[] { 1' 2' 3 }.Contains(x.Id))");                      Console.WriteLine("-> SQL query:");                      Console.WriteLine(query2);                  }              }              catch (Exception e)              {                  System.Console.Out.WriteLine(e.Message);                  System.Console.Out.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);              }
